control_attributes.Control: AC-16 (4) ASSOCIATION OF ATTRIBUTES BY AUTHORIZED INDIVIDUALS
control_attributes.control_description: The information system supports the association of [Assignment: organization-defined security attributes] with [Assignment: organization-defined subjects and objects] by authorized individuals (or processes acting on behalf of individuals).
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization provides the capability to expeditiously disconnect or disable remote access to the information system within [Assignment: organization-defined time period].

Control Statement: The information system supports the association of [Assignment: organization-defined security attributes] with [Assignment: organization-defined subjects and objects] by authorized individuals (or processes acting on behalf of individuals).
Control Name: AC-16 (4) ASSOCIATION OF ATTRIBUTES BY AUTHORIZED INDIVIDUALS
